item.title: Throne of Lies Soundtrack is Here, FREE to Stream!
item.dc:creator: Thor_Odinson
item.description:
Can you guys name the tracks that were not included on the list? One of my favourite tracks isn’t there at all, so it’s most certainly in the category of tracks that were excluded.

item.title: Throne of Lies Soundtrack is Here, FREE to Stream!
item.dc:creator: Thor_Odinson
item.description:
Death Recap I sounds an awful lot like Dwarf Fortress’s Fortress Mode music.

Btw, is there a track missing from here? One which plays during the day, it has a lot of slow horns/trumpets.
